types1:Item.types1:Name: Process_SAP_Check_CountryDefaultProducts
types1:Item.types1:Description: Creates or updates a Business Partner and Commercial Project in SAP when an Opportunity is Closed (Won) in VForce

process.name: Process_SAP_Check_CountryDefaultProducts
process.description: Creates or updates a Business Partner and Commercial Project in SAP when an Opportunity is Closed (Won) in VForce

parameter.name: __filter
parameter.expression: 'ProjectID eq ''' || $input.in_ProjectID || ''' and startswith(WorkPackageName, '''|| $input.in_ExecutionCountryISO || '_Ongoing Custom Service - One Time_S'')'

parameter.name: __filter
parameter.expression: 'ProjectID eq ''' || $input.in_ProjectID || ''' and startswith(WorkPackageName, '''|| $input.in_ExecutionCountryISO || '_Implementation Custom Services - One Time_S'')'

parameter.name: __filter
parameter.expression: 'ProjectID eq ''' || $input.in_ProjectID || ''' and startswith(WorkPackageName, '''|| $input.in_ExecutionCountryISO || '_Regulatory Compliance Custom Service - One Time_S'')'

parameter.name: __filter
parameter.expression: 'ProjectID eq ''' || $input.in_ProjectID || ''' and startswith(WorkPackageName, '''|| $input.in_ExecutionCountryISO || '_Statutory Compliance Custom Service - One Time_S'')'
